attributes.action: Show support for President Donald J Trump during his visit to the UK
attributes.background: After the recent petition denouncing and attempting to ban President Donald J Trump from visiting the UK in a State visit we the under signed pledge our support in this one single matter and it is not a statement of support for President Trump overall

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want President Trump to make a state visit to the UK, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178844
